verses.roman:
eka 'kṛṣṇaloka' haya trividha-prakāra
gokulākhya, mathurākhya, dvārakākhya āra

synonyms: eka—one; kṛṣṇa-loka—the planet known as Kṛṣṇaloka; haya—there is; tri-vidha-prakāra—in three different divisions; gokula-ākhya—Gokula; mathurā-ākhya—Mathurā; dvārakā-ākhya—Dvārakā; āra—and.
translation: "The planet of Kṛṣṇaloka is divided into three sections-Gokula, Mathurā and Dvārakā.
